radialStep(int, int, int) - Method in class chess.model.Position
Returns a new position that is a number of steps away from this position in any linear path that lies on or in-between the X and Y axes of a 2D Cartesian plane, with respect to White's point of view, the default POV of the chessboard setup.

right(int) - Method in class chess.model.Position
Returns a new position that is a number of squares to the right of this position from White's point of view, the default POV of the chessboard setup.
